definition: Frühling refers to the season that follows winter and precedes summer. It is commonly associated with the blooming of flowers, the return of warmer weather, and the lengthening of daylight hours. This term is typically used to describe the time period when nature awakens from its winter slumber, symbolizing renewal and growth.

examples.german: Im Frühling wird es wärmer und die Tage werden länger.
examples.english: In spring, it gets warmer and the days get longer.

examples.german: Frühling ist die Zeit der Erneuerung und des Neuanfangs.
examples.english: Spring is the time of renewal and new beginnings.

examples.german: Im Frühling kann man die ersten Vögel singen hören.
examples.english: In spring, you can hear the first birds singing.
